meanings.meaning: Basically this means that there is a problem with the Mass Air Flow (MAF) sensor or circuit. Other MAF sensor circuit DTC trouble codes are P0101, P0102, P0103, and P0104.

causes.cause: The MAF may be disconnected, or a wiring connection may be bad
The MAF sensor may be faulty

solutions.solution: Check the voltage of the MAF sensor (refer to a repair manual for vehicle specific information)
Unplug and reconnect the MAF wiring harness
Verify that the Mass Air Flow Sensor wiring is connected properly and that there are no broken / frayed wires.

symptoms.symptom: You will likely not notice any serious drivability problems, although there may be symptoms such as a general decrease in power or sluggishness.
